entry.title: Aliyev revives demand for extraterritorial corridor through Syunik

media:group.media:title: Aliyev revives demand for extraterritorial corridor through Syunik
media:group.media:description:
๐Aliyev demands Armenia allow the establishment of an extra-territorial corridor across Syunik or else he will keep Armenia blockaded forever. ๐The Armenian government will provide a loan of approximately 8.5 million dollars for the metallurgical plant project being relocated from the border village of Yeraskh. ๐Security Council Secretary Armen Grigoryan to participate in Ukrainian peace forum which Moscow has called "a blatantly anti-Russian events" ๐Bombshell report in New Lines Magazine suggests Azerbaijan may have been building a concentration camp in Aghdam as part of its plan to take over Nagorno-Karabakh. ๐Our latest podcast episode with guest Erik Yeghyan about his transition from soldier to winemaker, and Armenia's ambitions for the sector. entry.title: From Frontlines to Vineyards: A Veteran's Transition into Winemaking

media:group.media:title: From Frontlines to Vineyards: A Veteran's Transition into Winemaking
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of the Civilnet Podcast, host Patrick Elliott speaks with Erik Yeghyan, a combat veteran of the Karabakh war who transitioned to winemaking after his military service. They discuss Yeghyan's experience on the frontlines defending Artsakh and what drove him to return home to work in Armenia's burgeoning wine industry. Elliott and Yeghyan explore how Armenian winemakers are reviving ancient grape varieties and traditions to create world-class wines and boost the country's reputation in the global market.

entry.title: What type of leadership is required to help heal nations? #shorts

media:group.media:title: What type of leadership is required to help heal nations? #shorts
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, we explore the life of Armen Kherlopian, Ph.D., a scientist, researcher, angel investor, and advisor to the board of several prominent corporations. We discuss the relevance of artificial intelligence, data sciences, and innovations for tomorrow. With a background in biomedical engineering and biophysics, we assess how Dr. Kherlopian entered the world of entrepreneurship, investments, and startups and how he makes sense of a world increasingly dependent on machine learning. Finally, we explore Dr. Kherlopianโs historical and family legacies from Aintab and Marash, which have been pivotal in his successes and mission to push boundaries in tech and sciences and contribute to the betterment of our world. Watch full interview: https://youtu.be/j6kQD8148TQ

ีีกีถึีกีบีฅีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีธึีฝีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึีธีญีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ิฑึีดีฅีถ ิฑีทีธีฟีตีกีถีซ ีฃีธึีฎีจ ึีกีฝีฟีกีขีกีถ ีีกึีกีฆีคีกีฟ ีีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีตีกีถีจ ยซีปีธึึยป ีง ีธึีกีฏีธึีดึ ีีก ีฏีกึีฎีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีนีซ ีถีฏีกีฟีดีกีดีข ีฏีกีฌีกีถึีซ ีจีถีฉีกึีกีฏีกึีฃีฅึีจ ีฏีซึีกีผีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีญีฟึีกีฏีกีถ ีธึ ีกีถีกึีคีกึ ีฏีฅึีบีธีพโค ยซิฑีตีฝ ีขีกีถีกีฑึีธีพ ิฑีทีธีฟีตีกีถีจ ีคีกีฝีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีขีกีถีฟีกึีฏีตีกีฌ ีงยปึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ึีกีฝีฟีกีขีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึึีฅีฌ ีง ีถีกึ ีฏีกีฌีกีถีกีพีธึีดีกีถ ีบึีกีฏีฟีซีฏีกีตีซ ีธึ ีกีตีฌีจีถีฟึีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีญีกึีกีถีดีกีถ ีดีซีปีธึีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถึ

entry.title: CivilNet Wins Court Case Against Government on Mining Inspections

media:group.media:title: CivilNet Wins Court Case Against Government on Mining Inspections
media:group.media:description:
๐Armenia has responded to Azerbaijan's latest proposals related to a peace agreement, while US State Department Advisor Louis Bono pays a visit to Armenia to discuss the process. ๐Pope Francis urges the signing of a peace treaty between Armenia and Azerbaijan and for the refugeesโ right to return in his annual โState of the Worldโ address. ๐CivilNet wins a court case which obligates the government's department of Environmental Protection and Subsoil Inspection to release details on its mining inspections and the violations found. ๐Our latest episode of Mindful Leaders is with scientist, data researcher, and angel investor Dr. Armen Kherlopian. He talks AI, startups, and the inspiration he draws from his family roots from Cilicia. Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j6kQD8148TQ ๐Also, celebrating Sergei Parajanovโs 100th birthday.
